entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
